article: hundreds of newly released cables that john d. negroponte sent to washington while serving as ambassador to honduras in the ####s show that he played a more central and assertive role than previously known in managing the united states ' covert war against nicaragua 's leftist government , which he called `` our special project .
abstract: cables reveal negroponte 's covert war on nicaragua
